# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-excludes
(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock|)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.avi$
\.bin$
\.gz$
\.ico$
\.jpe?g$
\.lock$
\.map$
\.min\..
\.mod$
\.mp[34]$
\.png$
\.wav$
^deps/
^lib/
^\.github/
^\Q.gitattributes\E$
^\Qci/srht/index.json\E$
^\Qsrc/clang_options_data.zig\E$
^\Qsrc/mingw.zig\E$
^\Qsrc/musl.zig\E$
^\Qsrc/wasi_libc.zig\E$
